co.cask.cdap.api.spark

Interface SparkClientContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientLocalizationContext, DatasetContext, PluginContext, RuntimeContext, ServiceDiscoverer, WorkflowInfoProvider

    @Beta
public interface SparkClientContext
extends RuntimeContext, DatasetContext, ClientLocalizationContext, ServiceDiscoverer, PluginContext, WorkflowInfoProvider
    A context for a Spark program to interact with CDAP. This context object will be provided to Spark program in the Spark.beforeSubmit(SparkClientContext) and Spark.onFinish(boolean, SparkClientContext) call.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getLogicalStartTime()
      Returns the logical start time of this Spark job.
      Metrics getMetrics()
      Returns a Metrics which can be used to emit custom metrics.
      SparkSpecification getSpecification() 
      void setDriverResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources requirement for the Spark driver process.
      void setExecutorResources(Resources resources)
      Sets the resources, such as memory and virtual cores, to use for each executor process for the Spark program.
      <T> void setSparkConf(T sparkConf)
      Sets a SparkConf to be used for the Spark execution.

      • Methods inherited from interface co.cask.cdap.api.RuntimeContext

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecification

        SparkSpecification getSpecification()
        Returns:
        The specification used to configure this Spark job instance.

      • getLogicalStartTime

        long getLogicalStartTime()
        Returns the logical start time of this Spark job. Logical start time is the time when this Spark job is supposed to start if this job is started by the scheduler. Otherwise it would be the current time when the job runs.
        Returns:
        Time in milliseconds since epoch time (00:00:00 January 1, 1970 UTC).

      • getMetrics

        Metrics getMetrics()
        Returns a Metrics which can be used to emit custom metrics.
        Returns:
        a Metrics for the Spark program

      • setDriverResources

        void setDriverResources(Resources resources)
        Sets the resources requirement for the Spark driver process.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resources that the driver should use

      • setExecutorResources

        void setExecutorResources(Resources resources)
        Sets the resources, such as memory and virtual cores, to use for each executor process for the Spark program.
        Parameters:
        resources - Resources that each executor should use

      • setSparkConf

        <T> void setSparkConf(T sparkConf)
        Sets a SparkConf to be used for the Spark execution. Only configurations set inside the Spark.beforeSubmit(SparkClientContext) call will affect the Spark execution.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the SparkConf type
